page.title: 07Energy/Public Services:Salem
page.content: {ENERGY }Mains electricity by over- head cables. (Very prone to failure in extreme weather conditions).Some homes have generators. There is no piped gas -those who prefer gas for cooking have bottled gas (deliveries are made on a regular basis ) Other homes use wood- burning stoves, oil or solid fuel for heating and/or cooking. { { {PUBLIC SERVICES} -mains water from the local reservoir (27/62) via pumping station. Other homes are on wells. The main street homes (from Crosswell to Brynamlwg) are on mains drainage -all others are on septic tank or cesspit drainage. (Sewage plant off- centre of the village.26/62, and the septic tank servicing is by council tanker.)
